title: Update logo asset and add public All Bookings browsing page

requirements.summary: Replace the existing Rconnect logo image while keeping the public logo path stable so current header and Shop hero render the new logo without code changes.
acceptanceCriteria: The file `/assets/generated/rconnect-logo.dim_512x512.png` is updated to match the newly uploaded logo (download-1.webp).
The updated logo renders correctly in the app header (desktop + mobile sheet) and on the Shop page hero section without layout breakage across common viewport sizes.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing PNG contents with the newly uploaded logo artwork from `download-1.webp`, keeping the exact filename and dimensions suffix so existing references (Header + ShopPage hero) continue to work.

requirements.summary: Add a new public, read-only All Bookings page with per-booking details view accessible without login and without any status update controls.
acceptanceCriteria: A new route/page exists (e.g., `/bookings` or equivalent) that is accessible without Internet Identity login and displays all bookings.
The page supports viewing booking details (dialog or dedicated detail view) and is strictly read-only (no status update controls).
If the backend previously restricted access to all-bookings data, a new backend query method exists that allows fetching all bookings for this public page, and the frontend page uses that method.

file_operations.description: Create a new public page that lists all bookings and allows opening a read-only booking details view (no status update UI). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Badge, Dialog, Skeleton, Alert) for consistent layout and loading/error states. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add React Query hooks for the public browsing page that fetch all bookings via the existing public backend capability (e.g., `getAllBookingsPublic`) and optionally fetch a single booking via the public capability (e.g., `getBookingPublic`), using separate query keys from the admin bookings list to avoid cache/authorization coupling.
Register a new public route (e.g., `/bookings`) that renders the new PublicBookingsPage component, ensuring it is not wrapped in AdminGate and remains accessible to anonymous users.

requirements.summary: Expose the public All Bookings page in the main navigation for both desktop and mobile menus.
acceptanceCriteria: A new navigation item (English label) is present in the Header desktop nav and mobile menu that navigates to the public All Bookings page.
Navigation styling remains consistent with the current theme and active-route behavior.

file_operations.description: Add a new nav item (e.g., label `Bookings`) pointing to the public bookings route and ensure the active-route styling works consistently across desktop nav and the mobile Sheet menu. Uses existing shadcn-ui Button/Sheet patterns already in this file. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
